extendedInfo.description: The Monster, a scary game with very good looking 3D graphics, inmersive gameplay, scary ambiental music and 10 different mazes to stimulate your mind! (The Monster PRO has 5000+)You are a lost adventurer, trying to escape an inevitable fate. A Monster is loose roaming his maze, looking for you, hungry, smelling your fear, already savoring your flesh. You need to escape!Features: -Experience hours of scary fun in 10 different mazes (PRO 5000+)-16 Different Themes (from dark caves to inner temples!)-One big and hungry Monster trying to eat you-Easy to play-Good looking 3D graphics-PRO has No AdsMade with LibGDX http://libgdx.badlogicgames.com/Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ZorythGTwitter: https://twitter.com/ZorythGNo birds were harmed (or made angry) during development of this game, nor any rope was cut, or any ninja ate fruit, for all we know.Tags: action, entertainment, casual, temple, Strategy, plumber, lookuot, run, root, battery, launcher, doodle

reviews.title: This game has so much potential! And its going great!
reviews.comment: I want to suggest a few things that would make this game SOOOO much better: make your ambient music/sound not loop so obviously. And make it a little more realistic. Maybe, instead of text telling you the monster sees you, make it a constant snarling/howling/heavy breathing sound while he sees you. Much more bone chilling. And maybe do something new with your door block. Though convenient to be able to see it on both sides of a wall, it kills realism and kind of takes away from the need to \"find\" the door.
